content: fireside simple crocheted throw wrap yourself in comfort with the fireside throw a soft and cozy blanket perfect for chilly evenings and quiet mornings designed with first-time crocheters in mind this simple yet beautiful pattern uses basic stitches to create a rich textured fabric that s as relaxing to make as it is to snuggle under with its bold stripes and easy-to-memorize repeat the fireside throw works up quickly and can be easily customized to any length whether you re just learning to crochet or looking for a soothing meditative project this throw makes the perfect companion for fireside chats favorite shows or a quiet moment with a book create your own fireside throw and bring a touch of handmade warmth to your home fireside crocheted throw pattern by the unique sheep 2025 pattern notes this pattern is for a 42 x 38 throw the size can be increased by either adding more chains to the base row or adding more row to the end larger sizes will require more yarn materials yarn - 7 skeins big twist living in spirit 182 m 110 g per skein hook - size 4 5mm us 7 other - large darning needle gauge - 10 stitches x 17 row to 4 skill level - beginner abbreviations chain - chain sl - slip_stitch tc - triple crochet skip - skip stitch fireside crocheted throw pattern by the unique sheep 2025 pattern foundation row chain 142 in the 4th chain from hook work 2 tc the skipped 3 chains count as the first tc pattern repeat skip 1 chain slip_stitch in next chain skip 1 chain 3 tc in next chain repeat this sequence across you should end with a slip_stitch in the final chain you will have 34 tc clusters and 34 sl sts chain 4 and turn row 2 work 2 tc in the base of the turning chain turning chain counts as the first tc pattern repeat slip_stitch in center of tc cluster from previous row skip next tc 3 tc in next slip_stitch repeat across slip_stitch in last st chain 4 and turn repeat row 2 until the throw reaches the desired length finishing use tapestry needle to sew in loose ends @uniquesheep99 @theuniquesheep99 uniquesheep99 uniquesheep store fireside crocheted throw pattern by the unique sheep 2025
